text: Iran has participated at the Summer and Winter Youth Olympic Games in every edition since the inaugural 2010 Games and 2012 Games.https://www.olympic.org/youth-olympic-games == Medal tables == === Medals by Summer Games === Games Athletes Gold Silver Bronze Total Rank 52 2 2 1 5 26 16 3 0 3 6 24 49 7 3 4 14 7 Total Total 12 5 8 25 14 === Medals by Winter Games === Games Athletes Gold Silver Bronze Total Rank 3 0 0 0 0 - 2 0 0 0 0 - 6 0 0 0 0 - Total Total 0 0 0 0 - == Medals by sports == ===Summer=== Games Gold Silver Bronze Total Gymnastics 0 0 1 1 Judo 1 0 0 1 Karate 1 0 3 4 Taekwondo 6 2 1 9 Weightlifting 2 0 0 2 Wrestling 2 3 3 8 Total 12 5 8 25 ===Winter=== No medals won. ==Related pages== *Iran at the Olympics *Iran at the Paralympics ==References== ==Other websites== *National Olympic Committee of the Iran Youth Olympics Category:Nations at the Youth Olympic Games
title: Iran at the Youth Olympics
